author: Lai Siu Chiu J:
casename: Rothmans of Pall Mall Limited v Maycolson International Ltd
counsel: Low Chai Chong and Gilbert Chong (Rodyk & Davidson) for the applicant; Daniel Koh and Boey Swee Siang (Rajah & Tann) and May Tan (Yu Sarn Audrey & Partners) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Trade Marks and Trade Names/Registration/Opposition to registration of trade mark/Whether application for registration of trade mark made in bad faith/Whether trade mark applicant under duty to inquire into bona fides of proposed mark/Whether breach of legal requirement necessary for bad faith to arise/Applicable test to determine bad faith/Section 7(6) Trade Marks Act (Cap 332, 2005 Rev Ed)
